      • calculateSeaLevelRise

        public abstract double calculateSeaLevelRise(int year)
        1) Calculate sea level rise for the given year. 2) Set the element of seaLevelByYear[] corresponding to the given year. This method assumes that: 1) randomizationPercentage has already been set. 2) baseSeaLevelRisePerYear has already been set. 3) year = START_YEAR OR seaLevelByYear[year-1] has already been set.
        Parameters:
        year - the year from START_YEAR through END_YEAR.
        Returns:
        the calculated value of seaLevelByYear[year].
